TextView.android:text: Married couple can get there service of 4 stages. 1. Life after marriage 2.Family Planning 3.During pregnancy 4.Baby Care For every stage he/she will find some help tips related to the stage. Tips are designed expendably. By clicking one tips he/she can read out the details of the tips. In the second fragment he/she can read articles related to the stage. In the third fragment he/she can upload picture to the photo album. In the upper right corner there will be two icon. By click one he/she will to the home page where he/she can make and update his/her profile, see his/her photo album, change settings, share the app , rate the app etc. On the other icon, he can post his note or query. In the fourth fragment he/she will find the note that he/she posted. In the 5th fragment , by clicking the bot icon he/she will enter into the chatbot and can make interactive conversation with the machine.
